content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. I was not able to lower the price any further than 580 Euro per month, and the potential tenant was not willing to meet that price. He was hoping for a price of 550 Euro per month, which I was unable to offer.
name: Peter Schmidt

content:
If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.

Since you answered "No" to the previous question, there is no final price to discuss. We were unable to agree on a price, and the potential tenant did not meet my asking price of 580 Euro per month.
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you for the information, Mr. Schmidt. I hope you will be able to find a suitable tenant soon.
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you. I appreciate your interest in my property.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You're welcome, Mr. Schmidt. Good luck with your search for a tenant!
name: Evaluator

content: Goodbye, Mr. Schmidt. I hope we can assist you in the future if needed.
name: Evaluator
